name: Animals Learn, Identify & Puzzle game for Toddler & Preschool kids
name_original: Animals Learn, Identify & Puzzle game for Toddler & Preschool kids
description:
Introduction
　・Free puzzle game as quickly as possible to find the same animal.
　・The rule is simple, quick to find the same animal, then you can tap it.
　・You can exercise the right brain's responsiveness and rapid hand-eye co-ordination.
　
Features
　・Kids learn with cute cartoon animals. Easy to use.
　・Suitable for right brain exercise, the graphics right brain activation. Improve the observation of the brain, cognitive ability, concentration, memory, creativity and imagination.
　・Improve the response speed of the brain and the body and the brain and body coordination. Exercise visual ability to observe the dynamic objects.
